Sinesis walks toward the Predacon base. Sinister walks toward the Maximal b=
ase...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 8:44 PM
  Subject: Re: The=
 End is Near...........


  Twister/Blizzard


  Twister: We'll never know =
until we try!

  *Twister says to Sinesis*

  Twister: Which way to his bas=
e?

  *Twister asks Sinesis*




  *Blizzard holds Sinister's hand starts w=
alking towards the Maximal Base*

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    Fro=
m: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000=
 6:48 PM
    Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


    "Partner's!" Sin=
esis says. He starts to think.

    "Think Rampage will want us on his side=
?" Sinesis asks Twister.

    Sinister starts toward the Maximal base while=
 holding Blizzard's hand...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From:=
 ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, Augus=
t 05, 2000 6:38 PM
      Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


      Bl=
izzard/Twister


      *Blizzard sighs and keeps walking but looks behind h=
er and than doesn't anymore*



      Twister: Your right. It's not like sh=
e was going to let me stay anyway.

      *Twister stands up*

      Twiste=
r: I think we start looking now. The sooner the better. Partners?

      *T=
wister says to Sinesis while holding her fist out for him to hit his on*

 =
       ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 5:33 PM
        Su=
bject: Re: The End is Near...........


        Sinister listens carefully =
to the words of Blizzard.

        "Who needs a home, Twister!? Let's just =
go find another team that wants us and we shall be on our way to glory!" Si=
nesis said to Twister...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          =
From: ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Sa=
turday, August 05, 2000 6:02 AM
          Subject: Re: The End is Near.....=
......


          Blizzard/Twister


          *Blizzard begins walking*

=
          Blizzard:..Who am I kidding...I don't know what to do, I probably=
 eat myself!

          *Blizzard says sadly*

          Blizzard: It seems=
 the the whole world is against me accept for you. Even my sister. I know t=
he way she was acting, not normal.

          *Blizzard says to Sinister an=
d sighs and continues walking*



          *Twister looks at Sinesis*

   =
       Twister: It was up to me tell the others too but I didn't because I =
didn't do it before I tried to stop Retroflame and I didn't after because I=
 was too concerned with saving myself....That was the past and the future c=
an be different but it isn't looking up now that we have no home...

      =
    *Twister says to Sinesis

            ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
         From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sen=
t: Saturday, August 05, 2000 5:51 AM
            Subject: Re: The End is Ne=
ar...........


            "Okay." Sinister said lamely. He walked off wit=
h Blizzard whenever Blizzard walks off.

            Sinesis sighs.
       =
      
            "I always said I never made any mistakes. That I was per=
fect, but once, I was supposed to fight some criminals that had a bounty on=
 them, but I was not to harm anyone else. I killed that criminal for my own=
 selfish needs, but he had a time bomb set. I thoguht I could disarm it, bu=
t all I did was set the time even lower, and some bots didn't have time to =
get away. I managed to get away since I knew about it, but I never told the=
m, so that's why I chose the evil path in life, I felt I had done something=
 evil..." Sinesis said...
              ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
         From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
     =
         Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 5:24 AM
              Subject: Re:=
 The End is Near...........


              Twister/Blizzard


            =
  Twister: I was sent on a mission to stop another bot named Retroflame. Sh=
e planed to blow up some other bots that didn't know a thing because she cl=
aimed that they were in her way. I was given no partners for there were non=
e to give. I didn't stop them....I tried but I was shelfish and excaped in =
a pod thinking of only myself and other bots were killed not only because o=
f Retroflame but also because of me....I deserved to be near that bomb.....=
There were missions before that but I wish not speak of for I have failed t=
oo many.......I wouldn't kill myself for I would probably be sent back down=
 for the Matrix would not want my selfish kind in.......

              *Tw=
ister says to Sinesis*


              *Blizzard sighs and looks up again s=
till frowning*

              Blizzard: We need to find shelter, my love.

=
              *Blizzard says to Sinister*

                ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
                From: THECODE 
                To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
                Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:30 AM
         =
       Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


                Sinesis wa=
lks to Twister.

                "A failure? When were you a failure? Tell =
me of one of your adventures on Cybertron that was a failure." Sinesis said=
. Sinister shook his head.

                "Unbelievable." Sinister said. =
Stronghold and Blender look at eahc other. They laugh at Plintissa and Drac=
ona's misfortune and take a smoke, then walk off to find another side to jo=
in, all the time hoping that Artist suffers and hoping that Twister really =
is and always will be a failure...
                  ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
                  From: ilovealllizards 
                  To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:22 AM
 =
                 Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


                =
  Twister/Blizzard


                  *Twister looks at what was left of t=
he base*

                  Twister: I always be nothing but a failer with =
nowhere to go...

                  *Twister walks next to the pieces of th=
e base sits down staring at the ground*


                  *Blizzard frown=
s and a mech tear runs out of her optic*

                  Blizzard: I'll =
never have a place to stay that I can actually call home.....

            =
      *Blizzard lowers her head and sighs*

                    ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
                    From: THECODE 
                    T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 =
3:10 AM
                    Subject: The End is Near...........


         =
           Dracona looked into the pit. Plintissa wasn't moving. Dracona sm=
iled and walked back toward her base. A dagger flew into Dracona's back. Sh=
e spun around and grabbed the dagger in pain. Plintissa stood there.

     =
               "You do not know when to give up, you fool, but never mind t=
hat your an idiot, I'm going to grind you so small you won't be able to be =
seen with a microscope!" Dracona said. She kept her hand covered and flung =
the dagger back. It missed Plintissa and hit Artist in the leg. Dracona smi=
led in satisfaction. Plintissa tackled Dacona and took her down. Dracona on=
ce again turned to her saw blade to saw into Plintissa. Dracona fired an ic=
e beam, but Plintissa dodged. Dracona started to burn everything with fire =
beams. Plintissa still avoids it. Plintissa was always a good fighter, but =
it wasn't until now, after her bad life that she discovered her true fighti=
ng power. Plintissa beat Dracona mercilessly. Draocona's parts were flung e=
verywhere as Plintissa spun a simple stick through the air. Dracona raised =
the saw blade and sliced the stick to pieces. Dracona laughed and sliced Pl=
intissa several hundred times. Plintissa fell.

                    "Th wea=
k move aside and die so the strong can survive. As ancient as the Cosmos, t=
hat has always been the way of things. I'm sorry Plintissa, you were a good=
 friend, but don't take this personally, it's just business." Dracona said.=

                     
                    Dracona pulled back the saw blad=
e and thrust it towards Plintissa. Plintissa grabbed her arm from earlier a=
nd threw it. It hit Dracona's blade. Dracona slammed it into Plintissa, but=
 as she did, the blade came loose before it hit Plintissa. The blade flew u=
p. Dracona blinked her eye, the one Dinobot had scarred when she first ariv=
ed on the planet. The blade sawed through Dracona and left her in pieces ev=
erywhere. Her spark extinguished. Her last words were:

                   =
 "*Cough, Cough* Zardus I am sorry. Plintissa, do not forget your promise."=
 And Dracona died smiling. Plintissa remembered that she promised Dracona t=
hat she would never leave her sitting. Plintissa cried. Her mech fluid ran =
everywhere and she got weaker and weaker. Artist stepped slowly over to Pli=
ntissa. He was crying, too.

                    "Artist, I'm sorry it had =
to end this way." Plintissa whispered.

                    "Why are you le=
aving me, Plintissa? Why does everyone betray me?" Artist asked.

         =
           "Artist, there floats Dracona's spark, recover it, we can't part=
, she really was my friend." Artist walked up and captured the extinguished=
 spark as it tried to fly away. He contained it in a capsule.

            =
        "Plintissa, if you leave me, I'll...have no more reason to live, al=
l my friends are gone, my helping days are over." Artist said.

           =
         "Your helping days are never over, and we'll always be together." =
Plintissa said.

                    "This isn't some lame thing about how =
you'll always be in my heart, is it?"

                    "No, Artist, com=
e here." Plintissa whispered. Artist looked at Team Ultima's base. It was d=
estroyed, the funny thing was, that it was destroyed by Dracona, the very o=
ne, along with Plintissa, that originally built it. And there it was, stick=
ing above ground now and burning away. Sinesis looks at the base and sighs.=


                    "Twister, Dracona is dead, I guess we have to leave."=
 Sinesis says. Sinister stands next to Blizzard and sighs.

               =
     "Blizzard, we need to find another home, now." Sinister said sadly.

 =
                   Artist came closer to Plintissa. Her spark suddenly burs=
t from her and floated into Artist's hands. She said to him what he needed =
to do. He opened his chest compartment and his spark was revealed. Artist c=
ombined Plintissa's spark with his own, they became one.

                 =
   "Till all are one." Artist whispered really low. Plintissa told him she =
still loved him. Artist was overjoyed! Plintissa was with him now, and now =
they could never be seperated again. Artist, completely ignoring Blizzard a=
nd Sinister, and Sinesis and Twister. ran out into a field.

              =
      "Artist, now we need to take care of Dracona's spark." Plintissa said=
. (Remember, only Artist can hear Plintissa now) Artist headed toward the M=
aximal base, there Dracona would get a new body, one she could not attack a=
nyone ever again in, and where she can always be helpful. Artist held up th=
e contained, Dracona's spark still inside.

                    "I love you=
." Artist said seemingly to nobody.

                    "I love you too." =
Plintissa said to Artist. Artist continued walking to the Maximal base...

=
